entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Peter's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hart Island 5:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -10.8°C
Wind: NE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2 except plus 2 inland.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2 except plus 2 inland. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
